content: I don't have personal preferences for food or drinks as i don't consume anything! however, some of the popular brazilian dishes include feijoada (a stew made with black beans and meat), churrasco (grilled meat), pão de queijo (cheese bread), coxinha (a deep-fried snack with chicken filling), and brigadeiro (a chocolate dessert). if you're a fan of seafood, you might want to try acarajé (a deep-fried bean fritter stuffed with shrimp or other seafood.)
